channel.title: Jigaboos
channel.description:
Syndicated talk-radio personality Don Imus apologized Friday for calling members of the Rutgers University women's basketball team "nappy-headed hos" during a segment yesterday in his "Imus in the Morning" show. Imus and his producer and on-air sidekick, Bernard McGuirk, went on to further attack the black members of the team, calling them "jigaboos and wannabees."
http://www.foxnews.com/story/0,2933,264646,00.html According to [url=http://wordnet.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s=jigaboo]Princeton[/url] jigaboo means nigger. Well, shit man. At my highschool there was a guy on the field hockey team and a chick on the football team. All in the name of equality. Now I've watched womens basketball, and there are no white people. I mean except the coaches, and they aren't even chicks. Of course I'm sure there are some white chicks who play basketball, but I haven't seen them on the television so I'm going to stick to my guns and say they don't exist. Just like black guys who play hockey.

item.title: Jigaboos
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

No matter what anyone says, racism is all backwards anyway. If a black guy on the news called a group of white ladies ‘white trash’ or ‘crackers’ everyone would laugh at it and no-one would take it seriously. But if a white guy calls a group of black ladies a name, you would think he murdered a race by the media coverage.

Bottom line, get over it. If we are supposed to believe that everyone is created equal, we need to ignore color all together, not publicize the differences every time someone says something.

Read full topic

you mean Rosa parks.

item.title: Jigaboos
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]Also with NHL seeing a black guy. But it’s just wrong calling the team a bunch of whores, Niggers and Wannabes.

Totally wrong. But if there are seperate leagues for women and men maybe there should be seperate leagues for black chicks and white chicks.

Sports leagues are supposed to be a meritocracy, but they aren’t because if we only let the best people play we would never let any women play. So we have seperate leagues for the girlies. Seperate but equal (er, just with shorter hoops…). A policy of segregation. Now in womens basketball very few white chicks get to play, why don’t we make a new league for this minority, just like we did for women? Because that would be “Racist”.[/quote]
It would be racist, and it won’t happen because of incidents like that lady on the bus and so forth.

Read full topic

are you black. Not being racist =\

item.title: Jigaboos
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

PaulT:

I’m just taking the argument for women’s sports one step further. If we have to have equal funding for women’s sports because they can’t compete with men, why not have equal funding for white chicks sports because they can’t compete with black chicks? The whole thing is fucked up and stupid.

hmmm. True it is fucked up, I would just like to see a white chicks team vs a black chicks team. See how much the Black chicks would win by…

Read full topic
